log.invalid_priority: Invalid Priority value: '{{value}}'. Allowed: Normal, AboveNormal, High.
log.set_priority_focused: Game focused: set process priority to {{value}}.
log.set_priority_unfocused: Game unfocused: set process priority to {{value}}.
gmcm.section.general.tooltip: Adjust how Stardew Valley's process priority changes based on window focus.
gmcm.enabled.tooltip: If disabled, the mod will not change process priority.
gmcm.focusedPriority.tooltip: Priority to use when the game window is focused.
gmcm.unfocusedPriority.tooltip: Priority to use when the game window is not focused.
gmcm.logSuccess.tooltip: Show a log message when priority is applied.
gmcm.logFailure.tooltip: Show a log message if applying priority fails.
